comments.author: tiddleywink
comments.content: I was very much looking forward to a dinner of mushroom paté spread on slices of whole wheat baguette... until you went and mentioned calabacitas. I had finally forgotten how much I miss that dish! Well, now it looks like I may have to whip up a batch this weekend. Or try my own version of the huevos con nopalitos... it sounds amazing!

comments.author: Mister X
comments.content:
I've walked by Senor Moose a dozen times, it sounds delicious. Thanks for sharing -- we'll give it a try soon!

-Mister X
President, Michael Natkin Fan Club

comments.author: savvysavorer
comments.content: I was looking at that place and thinking "Hmmm Should I go in"? Decided not to but next time I will give it a chance.

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Who is this Mr. X?!? In any case, by all means everyone go there! It is so dang good.

comments.author: tiddleywink
comments.content: Well, whaddya know... a new place just opened up near my house, and they serve calabacitas! I got my fix on after all, thanks.
